name: Abyss Actor - Dandy Supporting Actor
desc:
Pendulum Effect
When you Pendulum Summon a monster(s): You can add 1 face-up Level 1 or 8 "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand.

Monster Effect
If you have 2 "Abyss Actor" cards in your Pendulum Zones: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 Level 1 or 8 "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster, that is either in your hand or face-up in your Extra Deck. You can only use this effect of "Abyss Actor - Dandy Supporting Actor" once per turn.
